price: Na Ayyubu, alipo mwita Mola wake Mlezi, akasema: Mimi yamenipata madhara. Na Wewe ndiye unaye rehemu kuliko wote wanao rehemu.
arabic: ۞ وَأَيُّوبَ إِذۡ نَادَىٰ رَبَّهُۥٓ أَنِّي مَسَّنِيَ ٱلضُّرُّ وَأَنتَ أَرۡحَمُ ٱلرَّٰحِمِينَ
footnotes: Ewe Nabii! Mtaje Ayyubu, pale alipo mwita Mola wake Mlezi, na maradhi yalikwisha mdhoofisha, na akasema: Ewe Mola wangu Mlezi! Hakika nimesibiwa na madhara na yananiuma! Na Wewe ni Mbora wa wanao rehemu..

version.title: Swahili translation - Ali Muhsen Alberwany
version.description: Translation of the Quran meanings into Swahili by Ali Muhsen Alberwany

meta.transliteration: wa-ayyūba idh nādā rabbahu annī massaniya al-ḍuru wa-anta arḥamu al-rāḥimīna
